sense.def:
The appearance of someone in a place
je prihod človeka na neki kraj, zlasti če je nepričakovan.

seg.quote: The fight was soon stopped, thanks to the prompt appearance of the police.

sense.def:
Someone or something's appearance
je videz, ki ga nekdo ali nekaj kaže ljudem.

seg.quote: I had ceased to worry about my appearance.

sense.def:
The appearance of something new
je dejstvo, da nekaj novega začne obstajati ali pride v rabo.

seg.quote: With the appearance of credit cards more people got into debt.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
makes an appearance in a play or show
, sodeluje v drami ali predstavi.

seg.quote: She has made several television appearances recently.

sense.def:
To put in an appearance at an event
, pomeni, da gremo na tisto prireditev za kratek čas, vendar ne ostanemo do konca.

Kadar je nekaj resnično
to all appearances
ali
by all appearances
, kaže, da je tako po tistem, kar o stvari vemo.

seg.quote: To all appearances he doesn't work hard.
